descriptionHtml:
This is my first MOD
I am not good at English. sorry

Savage Shield - Variation of Imperial Light Shield

Savage Shield stats:
Armor: 20
Weight: 5

it can be created in the forge (requiring Steel Smithing perk)

requiring materials:
- Imperial Light Shield x1
- Goat Hide x1
- Venison x1

...or kill some Forsworn, they may have this.

tempering need one Leather. 

Cheers.
